about.title: About Ganssi
about.subtitle: Our story, mission, and the natural beauty of Uludağ.
about.ourStory: Ganssi was founded on the slopes of Uludağ Mountain in Bursa, Türkiye, with a passion for raising geese in harmony with nature. Our journey began with a commitment to quality, sustainability, and ethical farming.
about.mission: To deliver the finest goose products to the world while preserving the environment and supporting our local community.
about.location: Nestled in the pristine, high-altitude environment of Uludağ, our farm benefits from pure mountain air and natural spring water, creating the perfect conditions for healthy, happy geese.
about.practices: We use traditional, ethical, and sustainable farming methods, ensuring our geese are raised with care and respect for both animal welfare and the environment.
